verses.verse: 'Now in the seventh <WH7637> month, <WH2320> on the first <WH259> day of the month, <WH2320> you shall also have <WH1961> a holy <WH6944> convocation; <WH4744> you shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> <WH3605> laborious <WH5656> work. <WH4399> It will be to you a day <WH3117> for blowing <WH8643> trumpets. <WH8643>

'And you shall offer <WH6213> a burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> as a soothing <WH5207> aroma <WH7381> to the Lord: <WH3068> one <WH259> bull <WH6499>, <WH1121> <WH1241> one <WH259> ram, <WH352> [and] seven <WH7651> male <WH3532> lambs <WH3532> one year <WH8141> old <WH1121> without <WH8549> defect; <WH8549>
also their grain offering, <WH4503> fine <WH5560> flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> three-tenths [of an ephah] for the bull, <WH6499> two-tenths for the ram, <WH352>
and one-tenth for each <WH259> of the seven <WH7651> lambs. <WH3532>
'And [offer] one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH5795> for a sin <WH9128> offering, <WH9128> to make <WH3722> atonement <WH3722> for you,

besides <WH4480> <WH905> the burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> of the new <WH2320> moon, <WH2320> and its grain offering, <WH4503> and the continual <WH8548> burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> and its grain offering, <WH4503> and their libations, <WH5262> according to their ordinance, <WH4941> for a soothing <WH5207> aroma, <WH7381> an offering <WH801> by fire <WH801> to the Lord. <WH3068>

'Then on the tenth <WH6218> day of this <WH2088> seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> you shall have <WH1961> a holy <WH6944> convocation, <WH4744> and you shall humble <WH6031> yourselves; <WH5315> you shall not do <WH6213> any <WH3605> work. <WH4399>

'And you shall present <WH7126> a burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> to the Lord <WH3068> [as] a soothing <WH5207> aroma: <WH7381> one <WH259> bull <WH6499>, <WH1121> <WH1241> one <WH259> ram, <WH352> seven <WH7651> male <WH3532> lambs <WH3532> one year <WH8141> old, <WH1121> having <WH1961> them without <WH8549> defect; <WH8549>
and their grain offering, <WH4503> fine <WH5560> flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> three-tenths [of an] [ephah] for the bull, <WH6499> two-tenths for the one <WH259> ram, <WH352>
a tenth <WH6241> for each <WH259> of the seven <WH7651> lambs; <WH3532>

one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH5795> for a sin <WH9128> offering, <WH9128> besides <WH4480> <WH905> the sin <WH9128> offering <WH9128> of atonement <WH3725> and the continual <WH8548> burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> and its grain offering, <WH4503> and their libations. <WH5262>

'Then on the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> you shall have <WH1961> a holy <WH6944> convocation; <WH4744> you shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> <WH3605> laborious <WH5656> work, <WH4399> and you shall observe <WH2287> a feast <WH2282> to the Lord <WH3068> for seven <WH7651> days. <WH3117>

'And you shall present <WH7126> a burnt <WH5930> offering, <WH5930> an offering <WH801> by fire <WH801> as a soothing <WH5207> aroma <WH7381> to the Lord: <WH3068> thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> bulls <WH6499>, <WH1121> <WH1241> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> male <WH3532> lambs <WH3532> one year <WH8141> old, <WH1121> which are without <WH8549> defect, <WH8549>

and their grain offering, <WH4503> fine <WH5560> flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> three-tenths [of an ephah] for each <WH259> of the thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> bulls, <WH6499> two-tenths <WH8147> for each <WH259> of the two rams, <WH352>
and a tenth <WH6241> for each <WH259> of the fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> lambs; <WH3532>

and one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH5795> for a sin <WH9128> offering, <WH9128> besides <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt <WH5930> offering, <WH5930> its grain offering <WH4503> and its libation. <WH5262>

'Then on the second <WH8145> day: <WH3117> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> bulls <WH6499>, <WH1121> <WH1241> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> male <WH3532> lambs <WH3532> one year <WH8141> old <WH1121> without <WH8549> defect; <WH8549>
and their grain offering <WH4503> and their libations <WH5262> for the bulls, <WH6499> for the rams <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> by their number <WH4557> according to the ordinance; <WH4941>

and one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH5795> for a sin <WH9128> offering, <WH9128> besides <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> and its grain offering, <WH4503> and their libations. <WH5262>

'Then on the third <WH7992> day: <WH3117> eleven <WH6249> <WH6240> bulls, <WH6499> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> male <WH3532> lambs <WH3532> one year <WH8141> old <WH1121> without <WH8549> defect; <WH8549>
and their grain offering <WH4503> and their libations <WH5262> for the bulls, <WH6499> for the rams <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> by their number <WH4557> according to the ordinance; <WH4941>

and one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH8163> for a sin <WH9128> offering, <WH9128> besides <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> and its grain offering <WH4503> and its libation. <WH5262>

'Then on the fourth <WH7243> day: <WH3117> ten <WH6235> bulls, <WH6499> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> male <WH3532> lambs <WH3532> one year <WH8141> old <WH1121> without <WH8549> defect; <WH8549>
their grain offering <WH4503> and their libations <WH5262> for the bulls, <WH6499> for the rams <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> by their number <WH4557> according to the ordinance; <WH4941>

and one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH5795> for a sin <WH9128> offering, <WH9128> besides <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt <WH5930> offering, <WH5930> its grain offering <WH4503> and its libation. <WH5262>

'Then on the fifth <WH2549> day: <WH3117> nine <WH8672> bulls, <WH6499> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> male <WH3532> lambs <WH3532> one year <WH8141> old <WH1121> without <WH8549> defect; <WH8549>
and their grain offering <WH4503> and their libations <WH5262> for the bulls, <WH6499> for the rams <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> by their number <WH4557> according to the ordinance; <WH4941>

and one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH8163> for a sin <WH9128> offering, <WH9128> besides <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> and its grain offering <WH4503> and its libation. <WH5262>

'Then on the sixth <WH8345> day: <WH3117> eight <WH8083> bulls, <WH6499> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> male <WH3532> lambs <WH3532> one year <WH8141> old <WH1121> without <WH8549> defect; <WH8549>
and their grain offering <WH4503> and their libations <WH5262> for the bulls, <WH6499> for the rams <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> by their number <WH4557> according to the ordinance; <WH4941>

and one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH8163> for a sin <WH9128> offering, <WH9128> besides <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt <WH5930> offering, <WH5930> its grain offering <WH4503> and its libations. <WH5262>

'Then on the seventh <WH7637> day: <WH3117> seven <WH7651> bulls, <WH6499> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> male <WH3532> lambs <WH3532> one year <WH8141> old <WH1121> without <WH8549> defect; <WH8549>
and their grain offering <WH4503> and their libations <WH5262> for the bulls, <WH6499> for the rams <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> by their number <WH4557> according to the ordinance; <WH4941>

and one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH8163> for a sin <WH9128> offering, <WH9128> besides <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt <WH5930> offering, <WH5930> its grain offering <WH4503> and its libation. <WH5262>
'On the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> you shall have <WH1961> a solemn <WH6116> assembly; <WH6116> you shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> <WH3605> laborious <WH5656> work. <WH4399>

'But you shall present <WH7126> a burnt <WH5930> offering, <WH5930> an offering <WH801> by fire, <WH801> as a soothing <WH5207> aroma <WH7381> to the Lord: <WH3068> one <WH259> bull, <WH6499> one <WH259> ram, <WH352> seven <WH7651> male <WH3532> lambs <WH3532> one year <WH8141> old <WH1121> without <WH8549> defect; <WH8549>
their grain offering <WH4503> and their libations <WH5262> for the bull, <WH6499> for the ram <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> by their number <WH4557> according to the ordinance; <WH4941>

and one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH8163> for a sin <WH9128> offering, <WH9128> besides <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> and its grain offering <WH4503> and its libation. <WH5262>

'You shall present <WH6213> these <WH428> to the Lord <WH3068> at your appointed <WH4150> times, <WH4150> besides <WH905> <WH4480> your votive <WH5088> offerings <WH5088> and your freewill <WH5071> offerings, <WH5071> for your burnt <WH5930> offerings <WH5930> and for your grain offerings <WH4503> and for your libations <WH5262> and for your peace <WH8002> offerings. <WH8002>' "
And Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH559> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in accordance with all <WH3605> that the Lord <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>
